techs.name: Hive Mind
techs.quote: 'With minds united, they looked to the stars.'

techs.name: Storage Organisms
techs.quote: 'Many strange organisms lined the walls of the nest, each holding a curious liquid.'

techs.name: Introspection
techs.quote: 'We think. Therefore, we are.'

techs.name: Gene Harvesting
techs.quote: 'Through our own enemies we will grow strong.'

techs.name: Bio-Weapons
techs.quote: 'The acid coursed through the creatures mouth, and was then promptly let loose upon the enemy.'

techs.name: Mineral Ingestion
techs.quote: 'Even the earth itself is fuel to the hive's hunger, its minerals serving a purpose yet unknown.'

techs.name: Stockpiling Instincts
techs.quote: 'By forcing itself to store excess materials instead of using them, the hive was able to prepare itself for otherwise lethal shortages.'

techs.name: Chronostasis
techs.quote: 'Our mind has no need to fear time, for it has taken every measure to protect itself from deteriorating.'

techs.name: Synaptic Structures
techs.quote: 'There were strange devices built into the hive's walls, which were thought to have boosted its mental capacity.'

techs.name: Counteradaptation
techs.quote: 'Using the genes absorbed from previous kills, the mind made its drones into specialized killers that were perfectly adapted for hunting their prey.'

techs.name: Aquatic Adaptations
techs.quote: 'All the world's resources are ours; the sea shall not withold them from us any longer.'

techs.name: Titanic Weaponry
techs.quote: 'As the hordes of smaller creatures pushed deep into the enemy territory, the larger beasts stayed behind to unleash hell upon their foes from a safe distance.'

techs.name: Symbiotic Weaponry
techs.quote: 'Gouts of acid bore down on the unsuspecting targets, hitting with unerring accuracy. The beast and its weapons were as one; a single living, breathing weapon.'

techs.name: Bio-Structures
techs.quote: 'The hive's lair was surrounded by rudimentary structures, a paradise of flesh and chitin that prevented any chance of invasion.'

techs.name: Mineral Adaptations
techs.quote: 'The beasts' arms glimmered in the moonlight, revealing the metallic nature of its weaponry.'

techs.name: Psionic Accumulation
techs.quote: 'The mind grew strong, storing excess energy until it was needed for processing.'

techs.name: Adaptive Weaponry
techs.quote: 'The creatures' talons crashed against bone, shattering on first impact. But much to our horror, they grew back in a new shape, and the next blows struck true.'

techs.name: Aggressive Structures
techs.quote: 'The walls of the hive shifted to reveal a mighty bio-cannon, which proceeded to melt the intruders with a gout of acid.'

techs.name: Psionic Manipulation
techs.quote: 'The drones crackled with energy, and from them came a blast of psychic power, tearing their foes asunder.'

techs.name: Reflective Processes
uniques: Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [20]% less than normal
techs.quote: 'The mind learned to think upon even the smallest of its processes, improving its efficiency by a large margin.'

techs.name: Synaptic Specialization
techs.quote: 'By dividing our thoughts between us, we can learn faster, and grow stronger.'

techs.name: Amphibious Evolution
techs.quote: 'The waters shall no longer prove a barrier to our expansion; we may travel through them as we please.'

techs.name: Adaptive Structures
techs.quote: 'The mind learned to adapt to the world it lived in, altering its structures to match its home.'

techs.name: Optimization Instincts
techs.quote: 'When the opportunity for growth comes, we must use it, no matter what.'

techs.name: Abiotic Assimilation
techs.quote: '... Now, the lands that once limited our growth shall only serve to feed our hunger.'

techs.name: Divided Introspection
uniques: Culture cost of adopting new Policies reduced by [5]%
techs.quote: 'By delegating our thought processes to different divisions, we can reduce the number of resources we need to grow our mind.'

techs.name: Naval Bioforms
techs.quote: 'The mind found that the sea provided its own challenges, and soon after, it learned to overcome them.'

techs.name: Oceanic Constructs
techs.quote: 'The sea, too, is part of our home. We shall learn to grow in its waters, just as we do on land.'

techs.name: Environmental Alteration
techs.quote: 'No longer shall we be forced to adapt to the world around us; it will adapt to us instead.'
